name: @mono-labs/tracker
description: Code notation tracker for scanning, parsing, and managing structured comment markers

scripts.build:all: tsc && cd dashboard-app && npx vite build
scripts.deploy: tsc && cd dashboard-app && npx vite build && cd .. && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "chore: release %s" && tsc && cd dashboard-app && npx vite build && cd .. && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "chore: release %s" && tsc && cd dashboard-app && npx vite build && cd .. && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "chore: release %s" && tsc && cd dashboard-app && npx vite build && cd .. && npm publish --access public
